column1: litlhare le nna yaka ke ena
eke dula dula dula ebe udutse dula
utlabeuelahle utlebone etlaya kantle ka mane ka tlase ka mona
litlhare ntho ee entso ke eng
ke eno ka morao wena litlhare ke eno
litlhare tloo retloketa pele ke pele
aa he tsamaya uiloema mane pela lemati
motlohele wena litlhare otlaelata ka tlase ka mane
hei ngwana eo ke wa mang
e utlaerekelwa ha ntate tebele bolo
ke kuskus yona ntho etelele tjee
hele hele u lethetsi litlhare di tjena
hei ha e kalo seretse sena
metsing ha rebine le wena a a a
litlhare keujwentse ausi mamello otlaurekela makwenya
